summary: An ordinance relating to the Board of Equalization of King County in regard to the valuation for the year 1925, for taxation purposes, of the leasehold interest of the Metropolitan Building Company, a corporation, in the property commonly known as the University Grounds, in the City of Seattle, directing the Corporation Counsel to take and prosecute an appeal from the action of said Board in respect thereto to the Tax Commission of the State of Washington and declaring an emergency.
